name: Herd of Bunnies
description:
Keep your bunnies well fed, healthy and happy to keep them reproducing and fill the game grid. Made in ~3 days for Ludum Dare 40 jam. Have a fun!

R - restart
M - toggle music
S - toggle sound

Art and programming by Snoutup
https://twitter.com/SnoutUp

Music* by Chris Wickham
https://twitter.com/chrisw90uk
* created before, for a different project
